abstract.t: This document specifies DNS Stamps, a compact format that encodes the information needed to connect to DNS resolvers. DNS Stamps encode all necessary parameters including addresses, hostnames, cryptographic keys, and protocol-specific configuration into a single string using a standard URI format. The specification supports multiple secure DNS protocols including DNSCrypt, DNS-over-HTTPS (DoH), DNS-over-TLS (DoT), DNS-over-QUIC (DoQ), and Oblivious DoH.
